Name: からかい上手の高木さんVR 1学期
About the game: Virtually experience the playful and relentless teasing of heroine, Takagi-san, in Teasing Master Takagi-san VR - 1st Semester (Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san VR). With sales of the original comic series exceeding 8.2 million copies and two anime seasons broadcast in Japan, the romantic comedy makes its debut on VR platforms as a VR animation. In assuming the role of the main character, Nishikata, not only will you be able to experience being the target of Takagi-san's affection(!?!) up close, you'll have a variety of opportunities to interact with her – more so than other VR animation titles to date. Spend time with Takagi-san after school cleaning up the classroom, play at the beach, and more! In addition to popular scenes from the original series, Teasing Master Takagi-san VR features original scenarios you can only experience here. If you ever wanted to trade places with Nishikata and get teased by Takagi-san, this is the animation for you! 'Shogakukan and Kayac Inc. tag-team to bring you the next generation of VR animation!' Shogakukan teams up with VR content and entertainment creators at Kayac Inc. to deliver the VR anime debut of the popular romantic comedy Teasing Master Takagi-san. A mainstay in the monthly manga magazine Gessan, the series depicts the daily life of high school students Nishikata and Takagi-san, who loves to tease the former. Teasing Master Takagi-san VR invites you to experience the fun with original animation and stories. [Production Staff] Original Series Teasing Master Takagi-san (Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san) Soichiro Yamamoto Published in Gessan (Monthly Shonen Sunday) [Cast] Rie Takahashi as Takagi-san [Planning and Development] Shogakukan & Kayac Inc.
